title: LibGuides: Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine (DACM/MACM): DACM/MACM Home
author: Nathaniel Stewart
description: LibGuides: Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine (DACM/MACM): DACM/MACM Home
cleaned_text: Please contact us with any questions or requests regarding accessing resources from the LRC. Phone: 562-368-3146 Email: [scuhslibrary@scuhs.edu](mailto: scuhslibrary@scuhs.edu) Eastern Medicine (also called Oriental Medicine, Traditional Chinese Medicine, or Chinese Herbal Medicine) is a rich, complex system that identifies the pattern of disharmony in each patient and then builds a unique, individualized treatment plan. In addition to acupuncture techniques, Eastern Medicine practitioners use nutrition, herbs, massage and cupping therapy, and mind and body practices to address health concerns. This research guide is a support tool to assist with locating and finding information pertaining to Eastern Medicine studies and research.
